**Government Tender Announcement**
# Physiotherapy Services

## Tender Details

* **Contract Title:** Physiotherapy Services
* **Contract Reference Number:** PW-22-01006264
* **Solicitation Number:** 21210-23-4151534
* **Publication Date:** September 6, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 21, 2022, 13:00:00

## Background

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires a contractor to provide physiotherapy services for the Springhill Institution in Nova Scotia. The objective is to provide essential physiotherapy services to inmates, including assessments, treatment, and patient education, in accordance with the National Essential Health Services Framework.

## Statement of Work

The contractor will be responsible for:

* Providing physiotherapy services to inmates and collaborating with the institutional health services team
* Managing all aspects of physiotherapy services, including coordination of care with other specialists
* Documenting assessments, treatment, and consultations in the inmate's electronic medical file
* Providing backup personnel to ensure continuity of service
* Performing routine maintenance of on-site physiotherapy equipment

## Evaluation Criteria

The contractor's proposal will be evaluated based on:

* Technical capability to provide physiotherapy services
* Experience working with similar populations
* Ability to manage all aspects of physiotherapy services
* Compliance with the National Essential Health Services Framework

## Tendering Procedure

This tender is open to all interested suppliers. The tendering procedure will be conducted in accordance with the Crown's competitive tendering process.

## Request for Debriefing

After award of contract, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

## Procurement Assistance

Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) offers seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact: Sylvie Gallant
Email: sylvie.gallant@csc-scc.gc.ca
Phone: 506-378-8724

Note to Bidders: Bidders can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.
